Text:
Hi, if installing on x64 pcouffin driver knocks out cd/dvd-rom drives.
Run REGEDIT & open:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE
SYSTEM
CURRENTCONTROLSET
CONTROL
CLASS
{4D36E965-E325-11CE-BFC1-08002BE10318}
After clicking on above entry you should see setting "Upperfilters" or "lowerfilters" or both, delete these entries, reboot, cd/dvd-rom will be re-stored.
